Text: You are an inspiration to us all. Thanks.

Thank you for including the subs. This is important to me. This will allow me to remove Suits (HD) from the DVR and get some needed capacity back.

Follow up: Watched and compared these files against the 1080i recordings I had on my HDDVR. Video quality is good. Its looks slightly more crisp and detailed. The black is a little deeper too. Audio sounds practically identical to broadcast, but better than the Xvid versions. Subtitles are in perfect sync. Also identical word for word to original broadcast. The Korean sub is awesome. I can definitely use those. The only negative is Episode 12 (last episode) doesn't have subs. Out of the many versions I've downloaded.. this is the best.
Made an account just to say how great this torrent is. Great quality, great sound. Thanks heaps!
What software do i use 4 this?

tjekk
The only software you should ever use to watch PB downloaded shows is VLC. 
VLC is Mac and Win compatible, it handles just about every Codec and it's fully adjustable when the sound or subs are out of synch.
It takes time to learn all the ins and outs of VLC, but once you start, it's like crack - you can't stop.

Also thanx much to Konashine for this impressive upload, your work is excellent!
